hero.title: Launch Your Mini Program Business with AI-Generated Code
hero.description:
Mini Program AI is an entrepreneurship program code generator that helps you build custom mini programs without coding skills.
Start your business in minutes, not months.

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Mini Program AI
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Mini Program AI is a revolutionary code generator that helps entrepreneurs create custom mini programs for platforms like WeChat, Alipay, and more without coding knowledge.

items.title: AI-Powered Generation
items.description: Describe your business idea in plain language and our AI generates the complete code structure for you.

items.title: Ready-to-Use Templates
items.description: Choose from industry-specific templates designed for various business models and customize them instantly.

items.title: No-Code Platform
items.description: Build, edit, and launch your mini program with our intuitive visual interface - no coding required.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Choose Mini Program AI
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Launch your mini program business faster, smarter, and more cost-effectively than traditional development.

items.title: Save Time & Money
items.description: Reduce development time from months to days and cut costs by up to 90% compared to hiring developers.

items.title: Industry-Optimized Solutions
items.description: Get mini programs specifically designed for your industry with built-in best practices and conversion-optimized flows.

items.title: Future-Proof Business
items.description: Automatic updates, scalable architecture, and continuous AI improvements ensure your mini program stays current.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Create Your Mini Program
usage.description: Launch your business in four simple steps:

items.title: Describe Your Business
items.description: Tell our AI about your business idea, target audience, and key features you need in your mini program.

items.title: Customize Your Template
items.description: Select a template and personalize it with your branding, content, and specific business requirements.

items.title: Review & Edit
items.description: Preview your mini program, make adjustments using our visual editor, and test all functionalities.

items.title: Deploy & Launch
items.description: Publish your mini program to your chosen platform with one click and start acquiring customers.

testimonial.name: testimonial
testimonial.label: Testimonial
testimonial.title: Success Stories from Our Customers
testimonial.description: Hear from entrepreneurs who transformed their business ideas into reality with Mini Program AI.

items.title: Sarah Johnson
items.label: Founder of FreshMart
items.description: From concept to launch in just 3 days! Our grocery delivery mini program helped us reach 1,000 customers in the first month. The AI-generated code worked flawlessly.

items.title: Michael Zhang
items.label: Owner of StyleShop
items.description: As someone with zero coding knowledge, I never thought I could launch an e-commerce business. Mini Program AI made it possible, and we're now processing over 100 orders daily.

items.title: Emma Rodriguez
items.label: Founder of BeautyBook
items.description: The salon appointment system we created has completely transformed our business. Our customers love the easy booking experience, and we've reduced no-shows by 75%.

items.title: David Kim
items.label: CEO of TechFix
items.description: Our on-demand repair service mini program generated over $50,000 in revenue in the first quarter. The platform is reliable, and the analytics help us improve constantly.

items.title: Lisa Wang
items.label: Founder of QuickTable
items.description: The restaurant reservation mini program paid for itself in the first week. We've increased table turnover by 35% and customer satisfaction has never been higher.

items.title: James Carter
items.label: Director of EduQuest
items.description: Creating our online learning platform was astonishingly simple. We launched with 20 courses and 500 students enrolled in the first month - all without hiring a single developer.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have more questions? Contact our support team for assistance.

items.title: What exactly is a Mini Program?
items.description: Mini Programs are lightweight applications that run within platforms like WeChat, Alipay, and other super apps. They provide business functionalities without requiring users to download separate apps, offering convenience and broader reach.

items.title: Do I need coding knowledge to use Mini Program AI?
items.description: No coding knowledge is required. Our AI-powered platform converts your business description and requirements into functional code. You can build and customize everything through our visual interface.

items.title: How long does it take to create and launch a mini program?
items.description: Most entrepreneurs can create and launch their mini program within 72 hours. Simple projects might take as little as one day, while more complex ones with custom features might require a few additional days.

items.title: Can I customize the design to match my brand?
items.description: Absolutely! All templates are fully customizable. You can adjust colors, fonts, layouts, and add your branding elements to create a unique look that represents your business.

items.title: What platforms can I publish my mini program to?
items.description: Our platform supports deployment to major mini program platforms including WeChat, Alipay, Baidu, Douyin (TikTok China), and others. We handle the technical requirements for each platform.

items.title: Is there ongoing support after I launch?
items.description: Yes, all plans include ongoing support. We provide regular updates, technical assistance, and business optimization advice to help your mini program succeed in the long term.
